        Convert a HEX colour code to a Color object for use in graphics drawing.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • vecFileLine

        public java.lang.String vecFileLine​(int WindowX,
                                    int WindowY,
                                    java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> xcord,
                                    java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> ycord)
        Constructs the instruction string for drawing a shape. Designed to be written to a VEC file.
        Parameters:
        WindowX - Width of the graphics drawing window.
        WindowY - Height of the graphics drawing window.
        xcord - LinkedList of X coordinates.
        ycord - LinkedList of Y coordinates.
        Returns:
        Instruction String for a VEC file (in the format '"IDENTIFIER" X1 Y1...'
